content.question: The image presented in line 11 (“So all...new”) most significantly implies the speaker’s

choices.label: skill in presenting the same thoughts in numerous poems
conviction that poetry is defined more by technique than substance
sense of being stifled by idioms that appear redundant
celebration of the most traditional poetic forms

content.answer: skill in presenting the same thoughts in numerous poems

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
